extendedInfo.description: Let the ball roll!!!Show your skills playing "Bar Vs Bar". The goal of this game is to score five goals to the opponent.Slide your finger under your bar to move it and intercept the ball. Stay tuned because the ball will go faster and faster. But this is not all, because surprising events occur during the game...How to play:Just move the bar. The player who scores five goals wins.Game features:- 4 difficulty levels- 5 board themes- 10 magic events- Classic mode option, without magic events- 2 players can play on the same device if it has multitouch screen
